basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Youssef Achkir. Fictional person for preview purposes :) I'm working with newest web development frameworks like Angular, Spring Boot and React. I'm an enthusiast software engineering student with experience in web development, I had the opportunity to work on various web development projects, including the creation of responsive websites and the implementation of interactive features. I also have a good knowledge of UX/UI design principles, which allows me to create user-friendly and intuitive interfaces

projects.title: Trip Helper
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many spring features and awesome tips. Application allow travellers to easilly find places to go and visit when they are in new cities.

projects.title: Containerzation
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for containerzation a mern stack application, with many tools such as Docker, Docker compose, Kubernetes, and Ingres.

projects.title: Appointment App
projects.description: One of my academic projects.We had to develop a full-stack implementation of a platform that allow patients to set up a meeting with their doctors. This was also my first time working with React and Spring Boot in the same project. I've learned a lot!
